message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of our premium product with you. I believe it's a fantastic opportunity for you to acquire a unique item that will greatly benefit your business. I'm willing to offer it to you for $700000. This is a competitive price considering the product's value to you, and I'm confident you'll find it a great investment.

Thanks for the offer, Alice.  $700000 is a good starting point, but I'm looking to get this product for closer to $650000.  I believe that's still a fair price considering the value it brings to my business.  Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your desire to get the product at a lower price, but I'm still looking to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $675000. This is a fair compromise considering the value the product brings to your business.
